name: The Two Door Montpelier Sideboard
description: A classic cabinet from the Davidson collection, the two door Montpelier sideboard is the ideal choice for those who are specifically looking for drawer space. Timelessly elegant in style, this cabinet is perfect for a dining room setting with a central bank of drawers for storing dining utensils. The cabinet can be finished in any of DAVIDSON's luxury finishes with either circular or rectangular drop handles in gleaming polished nickel or brass. The central bank of drawers has the option of being flock lined with compartments for storing cutlery with a pair of doors either side that open to reveal two adjustable shelves. The two door Montpelier boasts sleek angles standing on a facetted base of Art Deco inspiration.
